channel.title: All Swing jobs | upwork.com
channel.description: All Swing jobs as of July 19, 2024 05:16 UTC

item.title: Experienced JavaFX developer(s) for developing/improving a JavaFX app - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for developer(s) to work with our team on a project -  skilled and experienced in JavaFX and/or Java developer(s) capable to solve an issue when apps in SWING launched from JavaFX app block themselves and do not launch and also refine, organize and improve the code and functionalities of the local app in JavaFX (security, application update mechanisms, interface design and conditions on fields, local app security and user authentication module etc.).

Project details:
JAVA FX App to be fixed as above and current code reviewed.
The app is part of a client server architecture and works locally by communicating with the central server.
- Task(s) – various tasks regarding the implementation of functionalities in our apps as per our needs.
- Tasks will be given by us via our ticketing system, or via our chat system. The developer will work together with our team and shall coordinate with our team of back-end developers and the development will be made in parallel.

Requirements:
- Extensive and proven know how of JavaFX. Deep knowledge of Java constitutes a plus
- Experience with API's creation SOAP and REST
- Experience with Spring Framework and Hibernate
- Experience with REST API;
- Knowledge of web application best practices regarding the development and security of the applications – implementation of modern security controls and protection for the pages and access.
- Extensive know-how and proven expertise with a Java FX apps, security mechanisms and efficiency of resources usage, glitches etc.;

If the applicant is a particularly good fit, it may be invited to remain with our team on a long term basis.
Depending on the amount of work and expertise the budget might be increased.


Posted On: July 14, 2024 12:57 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Web Application, API Integration, RESTful API, Java, JavaScript, API
Country: Romania
click to apply

item.title: Core java developer - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

Strong Core Java 11 knowledge, Good coding, and problem-solving skills, Good Test Driven Development environment experience using Junit 5 and Mockito, AWS ,Docker, Kubernates,docker.
Good working experience in Multithreading/concurrency, Spring Core, Identity Access Management using OAuth 2.0, Encryption and Decryption techniques, Java Swing in UI, OracleDB with medium to complex usage of SQL queries, Gradle, Good hands-on with Intellij and GIT, Good domain and communication skills.
According to the client we need a candidate who is very strong in CS fundamentals. Like Data Structures, dealing with time complexities, memory management etc.. and apply those to Java(Irrespective of language)
Good in design patterns.
Aligning practical domain experience in determining where the concepts of core multithreading concepts should be used with practical working usecases. Ex: Should I use volatile, should I use Concurrent HashMap or etc...
Good in multithreading concepts like Mutex, Semaphores, Thread pools, ThreadLocal, different Inter thread communication concepts
Identify the deadlock situations or areas that lead to Race conditions/data corruption in a concurrent environment or see how/where threads are struck.
Different thread states, thread lifecycle and strong in basics of thread concepts
Worked in the areas that demand concurrency.
Open to work on a legacy trading application that demand performance intensive design solutions.
Realtime experience in debugging the application in prod checking Splunk logs etc..
In prod - analysing the Thread dump, Heap dump, analysing root cause of memory leaks, Monitoring Wireshark etc..
Monitor the outage of servers.
Analysing the parts of application taking too much memory, memory leaks and too much load.

Hourly Range: $33.00-$55.00
Posted On: July 05, 2024 06:38 UTC
Category: Back-End Development
Skills:Amazon Web Services, SQL, Core Java, Encryption, API
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Senior Java Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Java Lead Position:
Role: Senior Java Developer
Experience: 10+ years
Location: India working US Hours

Job description: 
Must have skills: 
10+ years of Overall development experience and experience in architecture, design and third-party service integration, integration experience with web technologies.

Extensive experience in API&#39;s / Web services / Databases / Queuing / Background Job processing.
Hands on experience on SpringBoot framework to develop RestAPIs and Database integration.
Extensive experience with successful implementations of highly scalable and highly available systems
Experience with agile development processes, must be able to plan and execute sprints.
Experience on AWS or Azure cloud technologies.
Experience in API gateway integration and configuration.
Should be familiar and able to define deployment cycle, manage multiple environments builds.
Should be able to follow best practices and standards, explore the technology landscape to evaluate alternative solutions to meet or exceed business functional and non-functional
needs.
Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand long &amp; short-term business needs.
Good understanding on JavaFX/Swing applications development.
Nice to have: HTML CSS, Angular, JavaScript, MSSQL, JavaFlex, JavaFX
Requirement 
Technologies mentioned in the mandatory skills
Expertise in backend and frontend technologies (Java/Angular or any), Web services, APIs
and any RDBMS
 Development tools (Maven, Ant, Jira, Eclipse)
 Build and Deployment using DevOps tools like Jenkins.
 Any source versioning control tools expertise
 Good knowledge on OOPS concepts and design/integration patterns
 Strong research, analysis, problem solving and evaluation skills
 Strong analytical ability as it relates to system design
 Ability to present to stakeholders in easily understandable manner
 Candidate should have experience in working on cloud-based platforms like AWS / Azure
 Knowledge of multiple front-end languages and libraries (HTML/ CSS, JavaScript, XML, JSON,
jQuery, AngularJS, NodeJS) 
 Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
 Degree in Computer Science, or relevant field. 
 Responsibilities 
 Hands-on contribution to the technical code and design documentation
 Support Product Evaluations and Technical proof-of-concepts
 Assist in responding to RFPs and RFIs
 Identify and evaluate the technologies that will be used for the projects based on
requirements &amp; technology trends

 Evaluate and recommend the development methodologies, frameworks, and modelling
techniques
 Identify and address architectural challenges
 Ensure that the application design is adequately documented and approved
 Understand / apply reusable code design, leverage application architecture / framework
capabilities and functionality, and design / develop solutions that are highly reliable,
scalable, and perform to meet business-defined service levels
 Conduct code reviews and ensuring quality solutions are built and tested
 Take full ownership of code quality and deliverables
 Help developers see the value of the architecture and understand how to use it successfully

Budget: $1,900
Posted On: June 28, 2024 13:21 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:AWS Lambda, Azure DevOps, RESTful API, Java, Web Services Development
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: .NET Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for individuals only. Agencies or representatives or proxies, kindly do not apply.

Currently we have written wrapper APIs in Java to interact with a set of external APIs. We have to migrate wrapper APIs into .NET as per business requirement.
We have APIs to migrate into .NET.
And test all APIs with existing UI (which is built in React JS).

We expect the work would take around 7 days for an experienced and knowledgeable developer.

Looking for India-based candidates only.  Looking for individuals only; agencies or representatives please do not apply.

Budget: $320
Posted On: June 26, 2024 13:53 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Web Application, Java, ASP, PHP, PostgreSQL, Apache Tomcat, .NET Framework, ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Re-build dynamic code website + chrome extension for facebook ads library filter searching. - Upwork
item.description:
Portfolio Building Opportunity - Desktop App Developer
Looking for a young Talented Desktop App Developer to Build a Portfolio Project!

I'm seeking a highly motivated desktop app developer who's eager to build a strong portfolio on Upwork and is comfortable working within a set budget. This project is an excellent opportunity to showcase your skills and gain valuable experience while contributing to a real-world application.

Project Overview:

The project involves re-writing or cloning an existing desktop application (name will be disclosed upon selection).  Your primary task will be to create a functional replica of the app, focusing on clean and well-structured code. This will allow for future customization and the addition of unique features on your behalf.

Desired Skills:

Strong experience in desktop application development (e.g., C#, Java, Python)
Proficiency in a relevant desktop development framework (e.g., WPF, Swing, PyQt)
Ability to design and implement user-friendly and intuitive interfaces
Experience writing clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
Familiarity with best practices for desktop application development
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
Bonus Points:

Experience with API integrations
Knowledge of database management
Experience with a specific UI/UX framework for desktop apps
Project Budget:

This is a budget-conscious project. Please be upfront about your hourly rate and estimated timeframe for completion when submitting your proposal.

Why You Should Apply:

This project offers a fantastic opportunity to:

Gain valuable experience building a real-world desktop application
Build a strong portfolio piece for Upwork
Work collaboratively in a supportive environment
Learn and grow your desktop development skills
If you're a passionate desktop app developer eager to showcase your talent and contribute to a growing project, we encourage you to apply!

Please include the following in your proposal:

Your relevant experience and skills
Your hourly rate and estimated project timeline
Links to your portfolio or past projects (if applicable)
Why you're interested in this project
We look forward to hearing from you!

Budget: $350
Posted On: June 24, 2024 08:50 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:JavaScript, Google Chrome Extension, HTML, CSS, PHP, HTML5, Web Development, Java, API, jQuery
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Full-Stack Java Developer for customising Sweethome3d - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a talented Java Developer to customise Sweet Home 3D, an open-source cross-platform interior design app. If you have experience with Java, Java 3D, and Swing, and enjoy working on creative projects, we'd love to hear from you!

#What You'll Do:

-Add and tweak features in Sweet Home 3D.
-Improve performance and user experience.
-Work with our team to understand and implement project needs.
-Write clear and concise technical documentation.

#What We're Looking For:

- not busy with other projects and not engaged in full time job.
-Solid experience with Java.
-Familiarity with Java 3D and Swing.
-Bonus if you know Java Media Framework (JMF) and iText.
-Good problem-solving skills.
-Ability to work independently and hit deadlines.
-Clear communication skills.
How to Apply:
Send a brief cover letter, and 3 best projects you developed. Please include "Sweet Home 3D Customisation"  at the beginning of your application. More details will be provided to sort listed applicants.

#Nice to Have:
Experience in Sweet Home 3D or similar apps is a very big plus.

Budget: $80
Posted On: June 10, 2024 01:39 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Web Application, Java, API Integration, Swing, Mobile App
Country: Bangladesh
click to apply
